NewsItem.HEADLINE: Carrier Wi-Fi and Unlicensed LTE 2017
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This report gives a clear forecast for LAA, LWA, LWIP, MulteFire, CBRS, and Carrier Wi-Fi deployment. Detailed analysis of cost for deployment and operation of each network type is provided along with technical analysis of each choice.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report includes a 5-year forecast for network deployment by mobile operators (MNOs), multi-service operators (MSOs), over-the-top (OTT) players, and other industry participants.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: LAA LWA LWIP Multefire Carrier WiFi Wi-Fi small cell access point AP RRH
